shareLinkBottomSheetText: Hey! I've started using PapiFi and want to suggest you do the same with PapiFi

addCard.title: Add card
addCard.subtitle: Enter your credit card info into the box below.
addCard.hintText: We accept cards issued in the EU, the UK, Canada and the United State of America only
addCard.cardVerifiedSubtext: You will be redirected to the main page in a few moments

addMoney.title: Select payment method
addMoney.sendMoneyFromYourBankAccount: Send money from your bank account
addMoney.payUsingYourCreditOrDebitCard: Pay using your credit or debit card

card.subtitle: A one-time setup fee of $5 will be deducted from your USD balance.

Creating your virtual
card, please wait...
card.title: Virtual Card
card.freeze: Please enter your 4-digit pin to freeze your account
card.unfreeze: Please enter your 4-digit pin to unfreeze your account

forgotPassword.title: Reset Password
forgotPassword.subtitle: Enter your email, we will send you a verification code to reset you password

resetPassword.title: New Password
resetPassword.subtitle: Create a strong password you can remember
resetPassword.resetSuccessfulHint: Please sign in to PAPIFI with your new password

earn.title: Earn
earn.giveAndGet: Give a friend promo code and get Â£15.00 added to your account

home.allActivitiesWillBeShownHere: All activities will be shown here
home.verifyYourAccount: Please verify your account to enable transactions.
home.yourAccountVerificationIsIncomplete: Your account verification is incomplete, preventing you from making transactions on Papifi. Please complete the process to enable transactions.

login.title: Welcome back
login.subtitle: Create an account or log in to explore our app

onboarding.cardSubtitle1: Our app provides Real-time Exchange Rates, ensuring you get the most accurate and up-to-date currency conversion information.
onboarding.cardSubtitle2: Stay up-to-date with the latest Financial News, where we bring you breaking stories and in-depth analysis from the world of finance.
onboarding.cardSubtitle3: Our Market Trends section keeps you informed about the latest movements and patterns in the financial markets.
onboarding.cardSubtitle4: Stay informed about important Regulatory Changes in the financial industry through our comprehensive updates.

send_money.title: Send Money
send_money.toReceiveLiveRatesAlertsNotifications: To receive live rates alerts notifications
send_money.transferFundsDirectly: Transfer funds directly to your recipient's bank account
send_money.sendFundsDirectlyToAPapifiWallet: Send funds directly to a Papifi Wallet using their wallet id

transfer.title: Transfer
transfer.bodyText: Use the details below to send money to your Papifi account from any bank through internet banking.

kyc.page1Title: Let's verify your identity in 2 minutes
kyc.page1Subtitle: Verification of your identity is necessary to protect your account by providing the following information
kyc.note1: Prepare a valid government issued ID
kyc.note2: Verify if the camera on your device is active and exposed.
kyc.note3: Prepare to snap a selfie and images of your identification.
kyc.page1HintText: Your section audio and video my be recorded, Verify uses automation to verify your identity. read more about your personal data processing in verify's Privacy Notice
kyc.page2Subtitle: Please supply the following details so that we can protect your account and help us validate your identity.
kyc.page2HintText: if you can't find your document type or country of issue, please contact
kyc.uploadDocErrorText: Please select a document type first.

tnx_pin.subtitle: Enter a 4-digit code you wouldn't forget

qr_code.title: Ask your friend to open the Camera app on their phone and scan the code
qr_code.successfulToastMessage: QR Code successfully saved to gallery
